constructor.details: Deploys the contract and initializes the EIP-712 domain used for      signature authorization in SignatureVerification.

params.amountETH: The amount of ETH to deposit.
params.lockboxPublicKey: The public key used for off-chain signature verification.
params.nftTokenIds: Corresponding token IDs of each ERC721 to deposit.
params.referenceId: An external reference ID for off-chain tracking. Requirements: - `to` and `lockboxPublicKey` must not be zero addresses. - `tokenAddresses.length == tokenAmounts.length`. - `nftContracts.length == nftTokenIds.length`. - `msg.value == amountETH`.
params.to: The recipient of the newly minted Lockbox.
params.tokenAddresses: ERC20 token contract addresses to deposit.
params.tokenAmounts: Corresponding amounts of each ERC20 to deposit.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 tokens to deposit.
params.lockboxPublicKey: The public key used for off-chain signature verification.
params.referenceId: An external reference ID for off-chain tracking. Requirements: - `to` and `lockboxPublicKey` must not be the zero address. - `tokenAddress` must not be the zero address. - `amount` must be greater than zero.
params.to: The recipient of the newly minted Lockbox.
params.tokenAddress: The ERC20 token contract address to deposit.

params.externalNftTokenId: The token ID of the ERC721 to deposit.
params.lockboxPublicKey: The public key used for off-chain signature verification.
params.nftContract: The ERC721 contract address to deposit.
params.referenceId: An external reference ID for off-chain tracking. Requirements: - `to`, `lockboxPublicKey`, and `nftContract` must not be the zero address.
params.to: The recipient of the newly minted Lockbox.

params.lockboxPublicKey: The public key used for on-chain signature verification.
params.referenceId: An external reference ID for off-chain tracking. Requirements: - `to` must not be the zero address. - `lockboxPublicKey` must not be the zero address. - `msg.value` > 0 to deposit ETH.
params.to: The address that will receive the newly minted Lockbox.

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

returns._0: The currently active Lockbox public key. Requirements: - Caller must be the owner of `tokenId`.
The current nonce used for signature verification. Requirements: - Caller must be the owner of `tokenId`.

locked(uint256).details: Reverts if token does not exist.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDefaultMetadataURI(string).details: Can only be called by the contract owner, and only once. Requirements: - `_defaultURISet` must be false.

params.newDefaultURI: The base metadata URI to use for tokens without custom URIs.

params.messageHash: The EIP-712 digest that was signed.
params.newMetadataURI: The new metadata URI to assign.
params.referenceId: An external reference ID for off-chain tracking.
params.signature: The EIP-712 signature by the active Lockbox key.
params.signatureExpiry: UNIX timestamp until which the signature is valid. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist and caller must be its owner. - `signature` must be valid and unexpired.
params.tokenId: The ID of the Lockbox to update.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Reverts if neither custom nor default URI is available.

params.tokenId: The ID of the token to query.

returns._0: The custom URI if set; otherwise the default URI.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createLockboxWithBatch(address,address,u.notice: Mint a new Lockbox and perform a batch deposit of ETH, ERC20s, and ERC721s.

createLockboxWithERC20(address,address,a.notice: Mint a new Lockbox and deposit ERC20 tokens.

createLockboxWithERC721(address,address,.notice: Mint a new Lockbox and deposit a single ERC721.

createLockboxWithETH(address,address,byt.notice: Mint a new Lockbox and deposit ETH.

getActiveLockboxPublicKeyForToken(uint25.notice: Retrieves the current Lockbox public key for the given Lockbox.

getNonce(uint256).notice: Retrieves the current nonce for the given Lockbox.

locked(uint256).notice: Always returns true for existing Lockboxes (soul‐bound).

setDefaultMetadataURI(string).notice: Sets the default metadata URI for all Lockboxes (only once).

setTokenMetadataURI(uint256,bytes32,byte.notice: Sets or updates a custom metadata URI for a specific Lockbox.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns the metadata URI for a Lockbox.
